name: O Lobisomem
description:
For Rickinzho! Made in the busy month of December 2021 and for the Secret Santa Game Jam!

Try to find your friends whilst navigating monsters from Brazilian folk lore! 

Credits:

BGM credit: You Can Use - Captive Portal

Sound effects made with SFXR

Known bugs:

- Dying and restarting from the menu will make two players -> close the application and start again (sorry for that) .

- getting pushed back from an enemy near a wall or edge of a bridge (any collider, really) will cause the player to clip through.

- There's no credit scene, but please see above for 3rd party credits.
